data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Kara is an unconventional individual. She ____ to ____ things ____ go ____ the ____ trends, regardless ____ what ____ think. Her ____, ____ nature ____ seen ____ charming ____ her ____ and ____. She also has a unique personal style and fashion sense.
data.partBlankContent: Kara is an unconventional individual. She pre____ to d_ things th__ go aga____ the us___ trends, regardless o_ what oth___ think. Her rest____, rebel_____ nature i_ seen a_ charming b_ her fri____ and fam___. She also has a unique personal style and fashion sense.
data.fullContent: Kara is an unconventional individual. She prefers to do things that go against the usual trends, regardless of what others think. Her restless, rebellious nature is seen as charming by her friends and family. She also has a unique personal style and fashion sense.
data.answer: 卡拉是个非传统的人。不管别人怎么想，她都喜欢做一些违背常规的事情。她的朋友和家人都认为她好动、叛逆的性格很迷人。她也有独特的个人风格和时尚感。
